professional: Python Developer (Django, Flask, DRF, Rest API, DevOps, AWS)
overview: As a software developer with nine years of Python experience, I can help you with online, backend, or API development services. I've used a range of Python frameworks, including Django, Flask, and DRF, to ensure that my clients' products, ranging from startups/SMEs to large teams, have a scalable back-end that can serve them for years.
For your consideration, here is my technical profile:
☑️ Python - Django, Django Rest Framework (DRF), Flask
☑️ Databases - PostgreSQL, MongoDB, MySQL, Amazon DynamoDB
☑️ AWS Services - Lambda, Ec2, RDS, SES, S3, Route53, Elastic Search
☑️ Cloud Services - Amazon Web Services (AWS), MS Azure, GCP, DigitalOcean
☑️ Architectures - Serverless, Domain Driven, Event Driven Architecture, Monolithic
☑️ Testing - Pytest, Unit testing, Integration Testing, Functional Testing
☑️ Others - Celery, Docker, GitFlow, CI/CD, Solid & Dry Principle, AGILE Work Flow - SCRUM

My ability to operate in a team as well as individually complements these technical skills, as I deliver via written and verbal communication, complete duties remotely, and manage various sections of a project.
If this seems interesting, we can arrange a quick introductory conversation to explore how I can assist!
*The rate mentioned here is a general one. No one shoe fits them all, the actual rate depends on the complexity and engagement. I will specify it in the cover letter!*

description: Started my career and gained a lot of expertise in the field of Web-development. Created 100+ websites on different platforms.
Developed and maintain a high-quality, scalable Shopify store for the client
Collaborate with client to understand their business needs and goals, and provide recommendations on store design and functionality.
Developed scalable applications using the MEAN stack and created POCs for rest service development using Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB.
Implemented custom features and functionality using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Liquid, and Shopify APIs.
Ensured stores are optimized for SEO and implemented CRO best practices.
Extend Shopify's functionalities to the next level using storefront APIs and meta fields
Redesigned 10+ websites and logos by using Adobe Photoshop, Flash and Figma.
Developed and launched 2 e-commerce platform and related products online.
Increased mobile orders by 18% by developing a mobile application for ordering and payment.
Gained experience with various web development tools including Bower, NPM, Git, Material design, Gulp, and cloud services like AWS, Azure, GCP, Heroku, and so on.
